testsuite.name: DashboardPayinTest.PayIn

testcase.name: handleDatePicker
testcase.system-out: User clicked on the Date Picker field. ===== Verifying all dropdown options for Start Time and End Time ===== Start Time From dropdown contains '21': false Total options in Start Time From dropdown: 0 All Start Time From dropdown options: [] Start Time To dropdown contains '21': false Total options in Start Time To dropdown: 0 All Start Time To dropdown options: [] End Time From dropdown contains '21': false Total options in End Time From dropdown: 0 All End Time From dropdown options: [] End Time To dropdown contains '21': false Total options in End Time To dropdown: 0 All End Time To dropdown options: [] ===== Dropdown verification completed successfully ===== ===== Selecting Start and End Time from dropdowns ===== User clicked on the Date Picker field. User selected 'Start Time From' as: 00 User selected 'Start Time To' as: 01 User selected 'End Time From' as: 22 User selected 'End Time To' as: 57 ===== Successfully selected all Start and End Time dropdown values ===== User is selecting a custom date range. Captured 'From Date' before applying range: User clicked on the 'From Date' field. Captured 'To Date' before applying range: User clicked on the 'To Date' field. User clicked on the 'Apply' button to apply the selected date range. Displayed 'Applied Date' after applying range: PASS: Applied date range includes both 'From Date' () and 'To Date' ().

testsuite.system-out: User enter ID in Username field User Enter Password in password field Click on submit button in login page User clicked on the Date Picker field. ===== Verifying all dropdown options for Start Time and End Time ===== Start Time From dropdown contains '21': false Total options in Start Time From dropdown: 0 All Start Time From dropdown options: [] Start Time To dropdown contains '21': false Total options in Start Time To dropdown: 0 All Start Time To dropdown options: [] End Time From dropdown contains '21': false Total options in End Time From dropdown: 0 All End Time From dropdown options: [] End Time To dropdown contains '21': false Total options in End Time To dropdown: 0 All End Time To dropdown options: [] ===== Dropdown verification completed successfully ===== ===== Selecting Start and End Time from dropdowns ===== User clicked on the Date Picker field. User selected 'Start Time From' as: 00 User selected 'Start Time To' as: 01 User selected 'End Time From' as: 22 User selected 'End Time To' as: 57 ===== Successfully selected all Start and End Time dropdown values ===== User is selecting a custom date range. Captured 'From Date' before applying range: User clicked on the 'From Date' field. Captured 'To Date' before applying range: User clicked on the 'To Date' field. User clicked on the 'Apply' button to apply the selected date range. Displayed 'Applied Date' after applying range: PASS: Applied date range includes both 'From Date' () and 'To Date' ().
